website_summaries.verdict: A resilient high density foam construction keeps these pinch guards from becoming compressed or bent out of shape.
pros: High density EVA foam retains its shape for a snug fit, use after use
Soft construction is gentle on doors and frames
Slides on and off with ease
Can be fitted on the side or top of doors
cons: Can break with repeated or excessively forceful door slamming

customer_reviews.title: So far so good !!
customer_reviews.text: I have two toddlers and a crawling infant. My toddlers have already smashed their fingers in the doors and I'm sure it would've just been a matter of time before it happens again, as well as my infant. I am so happy I found these! Definitely puts my mind at ease. I paired these with some door hinge (front and back) protectors for ultimate safety.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old is going through a slamming door phase. To prevent any pinched fingers or pets locked in random rooms I bought these. So far they are great! My kid has tried to chew on them and slammed the doors many times. They've held up just fine. She's pretty pissed she can't slam doors anymore, but my husband and I are thrilled! Highly recommend. Easy to put on and take off. Don't slide down or fall off. If you do need to shut the door, I just put it on the door knob until I'm ready to put it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Samus Aran

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Michael really likes to open and close doors and you know I don't use it as much to keep them from pinching their fingers as I do to ensure the door stays open and we don't get locked out! My toddler likes to close doors and then play with the locks so it's been very nice to make sure that the door does not close. As a side note if she finds one in her reach she actually very much enjoy chewing on it especially when she was teething so it apparently it has dual purpose!
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Choice
customer_reviews.text: Product works exactly as intended and was exactly what we were looking for. We needed something to keep our boys from shutting their bedroom door during the day, because our 18mo can’t open doors yet. We just slide it up out of reach, and then hang it around the door handle at night or when needed. Perfect choice for us and would definitely buy it again if ever needed. We have had ours for almost a couple months now and no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: rebeccab01

customer_reviews.title: Easy to tear. Not a permanent solution.
customer_reviews.text: Kids broke one almost immediately. Not the toughest thing you could get. Tears in half easily. Just be careful with placement. Sharp corners or edges will cause tears. Otherwise it works as intended. Wish it had sticky backing for permanent placement. Update: We've burned through most of them within a week. Do not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: if you're looking for something like these, then buy these. they're great. used to use them for tiny kids and tiny fingers - now we use them to keep doors cracked so pups don't get trapped in a room accidentally very nice quality and more durable than the pinch guards these replaced
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: This is a racket
customer_reviews.text: They work and save little ones fingers, but they cost the adult an arm and a leg for what you get. Almost as pricey as gold based on the the weight of these things. Perhaps you can come up with an alternative from a hobby store? It is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Removable and No damage!
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can remove them from the door and they do not remove paint or damage the door. We have saved many fingers! We have a 5 year gap, so when the eldest needs privacy she slips them on the door handles and that stops the younger from trying to access the door knob.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: No more worries about pinched fingers
customer_reviews.text: These are brilliant! With our sweet and extremely busy grandkids we are always worried about little fingers getting pinched in slammed doors. What I also appreciate is these can be placed out of reach of little hands on the door up high. For the first time since the grands became toddlers there were no slammed doors and no worries about pinched fingers.
customer_reviews.author: pierpontpatti

customer_reviews.title: Sanity saving
customer_reviews.text: This product has been sanity saving... they are easy to slip on and off our bedroom doors. We've had them for about a month now and put them on when the kids play upstairs to put a stop to the constant door slamming. None have broken or even cracked after daily use. Money well spent, and I'm so glad I don't have to listen to my toddler open the door, and close it, and open it, and close it over and over..... money well spent!!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Junk. They hold the door open if it’s not slammed. The wind broke three of them already by blowing the doors shut, it’s a good thing my children weren’t near them when it happened. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to avoid smashed fingers!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised, and maintains it shape as our toddler repeatedly tries to slam every door in our house (and fails.) This is saving his fingers on a daily basis, I even sent some to grandma's house and she uses them too!
customer_reviews.author: Nick & Crystal

customer_reviews.title: They last!
customer_reviews.text: These are such a simple design that I had low expectations. But they have held up well and they have my young boys from getting their fingers smashed... I think they might be a little overpriced but over all... I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tiny fingers
customer_reviews.text: We have a 2 1/2 year old who LOVES to slam her doors. These are a perfect fit for our doors, and the foam creates a good gently bounce to the doors. No more loud slamming, no smashed fingers, happy parents, angry toddler for no longer being able to slam doors! Parent of multiples, strongly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These are really great! They are easy to put on, even one handed. I have 2 toddlers that Chase each other around, and slamming doors behind them. These are perfect for preventing injury, as well as keeping them from getting stuck in or out of a room. I'm getting doorknob covers to go on the doors of the rooms I don't want them to have easy access to. But over all, these really do work well, they dont fall off, they fit on the doorknob when you dont need them on and dont want to lose them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These work great. My baby is a door slammer so these give me peace of mind that he will not get his fingers. They fit on the door great, are not noticeable because they are white, slide on & off easily. When we need to shut the door, we pull off the piece and hang it on the door knob for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: A Baby Proofing Must-Have
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely awesome! They are much more substantial than similar products, and they keep my older kids from slamming doors on each other. They also allow my fifteen month old daughter to play in her room without shutting herself in and getting stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Prop open front loading washer door
customer_reviews.text: I use these to prop open the door on my front-loading washer (double bonus, if you have small children, they cannot climb inside and close the door). It allows it to dry out without the door accidentally closing, or without the door taking up too much room in a narrow space by being all the way open.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel K.T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: These are absolutely wonderful! My little ones like closing all of our ...
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely wonderful! My little ones like closing all of our doors. It was becoming an annoyance and a safety issue. I love that these can easily be taken on and off the doors as needed. They are very secure and have worked wonderfully for us.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just bought these for our daughter who loves to slam her door and lock us out. It's great because no more slamming and locking. She can't reach it so she can't remove it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Evans

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to keep my 7 year old from slamming her bedroom door. They did not work for this purpose. She would slam the door and these just snap in half. Our doors are super heavy so if your doors are the lighter hollow type they may work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: BrianJP3200

customer_reviews.title: Great Door Stopper
customer_reviews.text: They are a lot larger than I expected which is great because it works perfectly to keep the bathroom door open so the kids to shut the cats out of the litter box. They are thick want sturdy. Will definitely buy again if I need more than 4 that comes in this box.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana

customer_reviews.title: Easy and worth it
customer_reviews.text: These are just as advertised. Nothing fancy, but durable and affordable. Great option if you have a little one who likes to swing doors and pay little attention to their fingers!
customer_reviews.author: CeCe 2016

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, does the job. Would recommend to anyone looking to protect little ones from finger pinches or hand slams in a door.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan E. Manley

customer_reviews.title: I like this product because it keeps my LO from smashing ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it keeps my LO from smashing her fingers. My wife like this one because it is white and looks and compliments our white doors nicely. they feel well made, unlike the last ones I bought elsewhere that broke apart after 2 weeks. I recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Ian B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome!! My 13 month old loves opening and closing the doors. It’s like a game to him! These help ease my mind knowing he Lott’s fingers won’t get closed in the door! A++++++
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: desired product
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my old door protectors. I bought these door stoppers and I am not sorry. I like quality, price of product and level of service of seller.
customer_reviews.author: Evelin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great, they’re made out of a really thick material so even when kids slam the door, they can’t shut it.
customer_reviews.author: chad+casey

customer_reviews.title: Product is great. Is exactly what it's supposed to be
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. Is exactly what it's supposed to be. Plus, for however these products might be available elsewhere on Amazon, this seller is less expensive?!
customer_reviews.author: est8esq

customer_reviews.title: Best invention ever!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for when the grandchildren are visiting. Wish these were around when I had children. They work wonderfully. No more pinched fingers. Then when they leave remove and place in the sturdy box they came in.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats too!
customer_reviews.text: We have a kitten who tracks litter everywhere every time she uses a box. We placed her litter boxes in a closet and half bath. These little wonders do a great job of preventing us from accidentally closing the doors.
customer_reviews.author: BudgetBeaus

customer_reviews.title: Protects little fingers
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren, ages 3 and 1, love opening and closing doors so little fingers were always getting caught. These protect them from that perfectly. They are easy to put on and take off and it gives me piece of mind to know they will not get their fingers pinched.
customer_reviews.author: LRolek

customer_reviews.title: These do the job and my little one no longer ...
customer_reviews.text: These do the job and my little one no longer smashes fingers in the door. I put them at the very top corner of my doors (which are already white) and I barely notice them
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Forester

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. I put these on several doors in the house to keep my toddler from slamming them all day. They're also great if your a/c turns on and pulls slightly ajar doors shut.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome safety product
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the door from slamming on little fingers. I like that when not in use, I can just hang it on the door handle. I feel better knowing the wind cannot slam the door shut with these on. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Slotwinski

customer_reviews.title: work well, but the foam breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: great idea, and they work awesome, but the foam doesn't withstand doors slamming on it for very long
customer_reviews.author: JHL

customer_reviews.title: Work greqt!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Easy to use, just hang on the door handle when you dont need it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: It fits the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Better than a previous brand. So far it didnt break like the other brand did.
customer_reviews.author: Kanan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! We put these at the tops of the doors and they fit super snug and definitely keep little fingers from getting squished.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done! No pinched fingers.
customer_reviews.text: These get the job done. They’re pretty sturdy and bigger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Little fingers can still pinch, but this does reduce the severity. The soft foam can be crushed by the door hinge.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for stopping the door from shutting all the way. They seem to be a quality foam. Cheaper than in stores. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley  LTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works like it’s supposed to. Easy to put on and take off. Only down side is I realized I usually have the door shut so I haven’t really needed to use them

customer_reviews.title: Safe fingers = happy mommy.
customer_reviews.text: This was the only thing we could think of to keep my daughter's fingers safe from the piano without damaging the piano. Works nicely!

customer_reviews.title: These are great!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great!!!!!!!! Now I just have to figure out how to put the door knobs back on the door lol

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy
customer_reviews.text: They work as advertised. I use mine to keep a closet door open and prevent baby gates from pinching fingers.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: A clean look that keeps your little ones fingers from getting smashed
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for a couple weeks to keep open doors that my toddler likes to close (including access for my cat to leave a room/ access the litter box). They work great! Easy to install and remove and they leave the right-size door opening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more worry
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Now I don’t have to worry about my baby shutting himself in the bedroom anymore. And I love that they are white!
customer_reviews.author: Raelyn Buhler

customer_reviews.title: It's simple and it works
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, the design is great and it stays in place. Whenever you're are not using it, put it on the door knob. Simple and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: This things do work, and keep kids from shutting doors. So easy to place everywhere, and they're cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Suselli Maul

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! Exactly what we needed to keep our little guys fingers from being pinched in the doors. I love how you can remove them and put them around the door knob to shut the door.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Red

customer_reviews.title: The door going to the garage always slams and I ...
customer_reviews.text: The door going to the garage always slams and I needed something to prevent that from happening. Every time my in-laws come, they let that door slam. That wakes up my one-year-old baby. This was a life saver while the in-laws were visiting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Great way to keep our toddler from shutting doors. Also very easy to move to the door handle when you do want to shut the door.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Worthy purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping your kids fingers safe! My toddler has slammed many doors with this attached and they don't even have a dent in them
customer_reviews.author: Kacey

customer_reviews.title: Can be used for pets as well as babies
customer_reviews.text: Very nice door stoppers. They were much bigger & thicker than I expected them to be. I actually use these to keep my pets from locking themselves in or out of rooms. Very happy with this purchase & would buy again! 😊
customer_reviews.author: traci lumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Not enough strong for wild kids
customer_reviews.text: It was torn between middle. My kids (2 and 4) push hard the door many times. May be good for pets.

customer_reviews.title: Door Guard
customer_reviews.text: I was a little dismayed to see they weren’t as thick as would have liked. They do work as needed however.

customer_reviews.text: Simple to use & doesn’t cause any damage to the door.

customer_reviews.title: Safe and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these! I feel very safe now because my son loves to shut doors!

customer_reviews.text: I love it it’s perfect if you have little kids

customer_reviews.text: Last time my 4 year old grandson visited, he locked himself in the bathroom. That won’t happen this visit!

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these things! And if I need to shut the door, I merely put it over the door knob. Buying a few more for more doors!

customer_reviews.text: Works great. Hold in position, doesn't Slide down the door.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to use - highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to use - highly recommended. I've recently purchased these pinch guards and they are simply great! Stops slamming doors and protects little fingers from being smashed. Sturdy and well made, I see these lasting a very long time. I love that they are white versus the colorful ones that tend to attract curious toddler. Beautiful packaging makes it perfect for a gift. I would highly recommend this for all parents of small children! Very happy with purchase and seller.

product_meta.title: Finger Pinch Guard Door Stopper - Baby Proof Doors, Protect Child Fingers with Soft Durable Safety Foam Guard 4pk. Draft Stop Cushion, Slam Bumper. Prevent Kids & Pets from Getting Locked in Room!
feature_bullets: BAMBITTO FINGER PINCH GUARD (4 pack). Manufactured from premium silky soft, non-toxic, environmentally friendly EVA foam. Ideal for protecting curious little hands and fingers of your baby, toddler or pet from getting pinched by closing door.

PREMIUM FOAM MEMORY. Foam guards do not loose its form, fits perfect around your door every time. Premium foam memory technology recovers initial form when taken off, increased material durability withstands door slams, jamming and hard impacts.

FITS ANY SIZE DOORS. High density, yet extremely light weight and durable foam door stopper fit snug around the door and does not damage door or door frame. Flexible foam let\'s it to attach easily and reuse it many times, does not slip off the door over time.

PREVENTS DOOR LOCK. Exclusive foam properties makes it perfect to use Finger Pinch Guard as door draft stopper or door lock prevention for kids and pets. Let your beloved ones move freely without door getting locked behind.

EASY APPLICATION. Use it on the outer edge or top edge of the door, up high enough for a baby to reach. Use a door knob to hang when not in use. Unlike colorful, flashy pinch guards - white color Finger Pinch Guard does not attract kids or pets, easily blends to any interior.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars224 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
